channel.title: Spin Master on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Spin Master on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Paw Patrol’ Studio Spin Master Promotes Marc De Vellis to Digital Games Head
item.description: He becomes executive vp and president of the toy maker’s Digital Games Creative Centre, with popular brands like ‘Toca Boca’ and ‘PikNik’ in its portfolio.
